solution.text: \( \frac {1}{_{k}_ \times _{k}_ \times _{k}_} \)would be \( \frac {1}{_{k}_^3}, \) which can also be written as \( _{k}_^{-3} \).

content.text: If \(_{k}_ \times _{k}_ \times _{k}_\,\) is represented as \( _{k}_^{3} \), then what is the power of \( \frac {1}{_{k}_ \times _{k}_ \times _{k}_} \) with base _{k}_?
